description: This scholarship honors a College of Liberal Arts major whose research, creative, scholarly, and/or service activities promote the resilience of American Indian communities. Eligibility Requirements Open to all declared majors in the College of Liberal Arts whose research, creative, scholarly, and/or service activities promote the resilience of American Indian communities Junior, senior, or graduate classification 3.0 GPA or higher Applicant will provide a personal statement that intersects their lived experience with the resilience of American Indian communities Must submit a letter of recommendation by one UCO College of Liberal Arts faculty member Must submit a research, creative, scholarly, and/or service artifact that provides evidence of their effort to promote the resilience of American Indian communities
